description.value:
Passage aboard a Void Craft, to another planet or in-system location. System Ships are Vessels that lack warp drives, civilized systems will likely have hundreds of such vessels to move cargo and people. The Default option for interplanetary travel.

Requirements

Most well developed planets have easily locatable docks with indicated destinations and rates. For a specific location or more questionable cargo, more negotiation might be needed

Effect: Average

Notes: 2500 T
